评论详情: Bummed about these because the style looked so cute! I have a large head and these glasses looked extremely tiny on me. They don’t feel super cheap so decent quality for price, just small and made my face look huge.

These sunglasses are super cute and trendy—perfect for a Y2K vibe! They look great on and add a fun touch to any outfit. The only downside is that they feel a bit plasticky, and there’s a bit of reflection when you’re wearing them. Overall, though, they’re stylish and fun, especially for the price!
Cute shades. They're dainty but solid. Pretty colors. Decent sun blocking.
